body:
It's been a long time guys. I don't think many people remember me but I used to be an avid player here and I'm getting a little bit back intro minecraft now.

Ask away.

replies.body:
-I'm 20 years old.
-Michigan, Ypsialnti.
-I don't know if any of these players are still here but I remember: PeachyYas, Itzjust4fun... wow I ca'nt remember anyone LUL
-Favorite gamemode would be Hunger Games (the one withOUT the chests just in a regular world that randomly genorated) and Nebula would be a close second but only on the old maps.
-For color idk, I like all of them only if used correctly.
-TacoBell LUL
-Rosewater (No one knows how this tastes like I bet)

Ty hun.

replies.body:
- I decided to come back because I felt like I was missing something in my life. (As lame as that sounds) I decided to put a lot of effort into league of legends and soon reliezed that I wasn't playing games for fun anymore and I was playing them just to win at something. Same for CSGO.

- I quit because the game just got boring at the time. When I came back, I did'nt do much but I was rushed with 3 ish years of memories.

Oh yeah I remember you, you were great!

I graduated from college/highschool dual enrollment plan because the princeple thought I was smart ( he was wrrrooonngg) and I got a certificate in 3d Animation I'll be reattending to a new college but I'm still looking for the right school.

3D animatior I guess. I want to do a lot of things but I really want to Model. (In 3D programs not in real life.)
